chart.name: chart.eau.per.etablissement
chart.title: Consommation de l'eau par etablissement
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.quantiteConsommation) AS amount, MONTH(self.dateDu) AS month, _etablissement.name AS etablissement FROM ConsommationEau self LEFT JOIN self.etablissement AS _etablissement WHERE YEAR(self.dateDu) = YEAR(current_date) GROUP BY _etablissement.name, MONTH(self.dateDu) ORDER BY month

chart.name: chart.eau.per.month
chart.title: consommation de l'eau par mois
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.quantiteConsommation) AS amount, MONTH(self.dateDu) AS month, _etablissement.name AS etablissement FROM ConsommationEau self LEFT JOIN self.etablissement AS _etablissement WHERE YEAR(self.dateDu) = YEAR(current_date) GROUP BY _etablissement.name, MONTH(self.dateDu) ORDER BY month

chart.name: chart.eau.per.controle
chart.title: Controle de l'eau
chart.dataset:
SELECT SUM(self.valeurCompteur) AS amount, self.dateControle AS date, _etablissement.name AS etablissement FROM ControleEau self LEFT JOIN self.etablissement AS _etablissement
WHERE self.dateControle BETWEEN DATE(:fromDateT) AND DATE(:toDateT) GROUP BY _etablissement.name, self.dateControle ORDER BY date
